projects.title: Automated Data Analytics Pipeline using n8n
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive data analytics automation pipeline using n8n that integrates multiple APIs to collect, process, and analyze business data in real-time. Created automated data extraction workflows from various sources with advanced data transformation capabilities and dynamic report generation featuring interactive charts and visualizations.

ai_context.why_this_project: I wanted to move beyond basic scripts and build an enterprise-grade automation pipeline that handles real-world API complexities and dynamic data manipulation.
ai_context.biggest_challenge: Managing asynchronous data flows and ensuring the visualizations generated accurately reflected real-time changes without hitting API rate limits.

projects.title: AI Content Aggregation & Automation Pipeline
projects.description: Built an AI-powered automated content aggregation and workflow system using n8n, leveraging RSS feeds and custom API integrations to scrape, filter, and organize real-time articles from multiple websites. Implemented intelligent content processing with NLP-based classification and topic extraction, enabling automated categorization into domains like finance, mental health, and tech. Designed a clean frontend in JSX to display categorized articles, trending topics, and workflow results in an intuitive dashboard.

ai_context.how_it_works: It uses NLP to read the sentiment and topic of RSS feeds, then auto-routes them to the correct dashboard category without manual intervention.
ai_context.future_plans: I am looking into expanding its capabilities to automatically generate tailored email newsletters based on the categorized content.

projects.title: 2D Game in Python - Pixel Fire
projects.description: A 2D Indie Platformer built in Python using the PyGame Library. Includes multiple levels and stages with unique Boss Fights and their respective stages. Used Sprites and a Level Builder to build the World.

ai_context.design_choices: I chose PyGame because it is fantastic for rapid prototyping and helped me deeply understand game state management and sprite collision mechanics.
ai_context.fun_fact: Building this 2D platformer actually laid the groundwork for my current interest in C++, where I am exploring more complex game development concepts like 2.5D isometric perspectives and the Factory Method design pattern.

projects.title: Full Stack E-commerce Website
projects.description: A full-stack E-Commerce application built with the MERN stack and TypeScript. Includes a responsive customer storefront with a shopping cart, product filtering, and secure checkout, alongside a comprehensive Admin Dashboard for inventory and user management. Features JWT authentication, image uploads, and automated email notifications with a modern Neo-Brutalist UI.

ai_context.design_choices: I deliberately chose a Neo-Brutalist UI to break away from generic, overly polished corporate templates. The bold, high-contrast visuals make the customer storefront memorable and highly intuitive.
ai_context.biggest_challenge: Handling complex features like dynamic shopping carts, product variants, and automated PDF invoice generation.
ai_context.architecture_notes: While this specific build utilizes MERN, my broader e-commerce experience includes building robust architectures connecting Django backends with React frontends, and containerizing deployments with Docker and Nginx.
